title: Omkar Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Peruvian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A lunch offering is the vegetarian plate that consists of brown rice, beans, salad and a vegan protein like soy meat, tofu, vegetables. Also serves vegan kibes made with soy meat and vegetarian empanadas. International cuisines include western, Indian and fusion in addition to Peruvian.
